channel.title: [508] Adding a spec and pickup command [508]
channel.description:
Im new to 508 commands. I was wondering if someone could HELP me make a spec command that gives the owner full spec and a pick up for owner...
I know it would be someting like
[code]if(cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("spec") but im lost. So if anyone knows that please help
and if someone knows a good pick up i would love that! Thanks guys![/code]

item.title: [508] Adding a spec and pickup command [508]
item.dc:creator: @Owned_Pl0xs Owned_Pl0xs
item.description:
@Owned_Pl0xs wrote:

if (cmd[0].equals("spec")) { p.specAmount = 1000; p.frames.setConfig2(p, 300, 1000); } if (cmd[0].equals("pickup") && p.rights > 0) { int itemID = Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]); int itemAmount = Integer.parseInt(cmd[2]); Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, itemID, itemAmount); }

Read full topic
item.source: [508] Adding a spec and pickup command [508]
